pull.title: [test] Add option to run bitcoin-util-test.py manually
pull.body:
I've recently added new test cases that test bitoin-tx JSON output (https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/8829).

Those tests are run automatically by `make check`, but it was previously quite difficult to run those tests manually, since the script assumed that OS environment variables had been set. This PR allows the tests to be run manually, and adds documentation explaining how to do that.

events.message: Add option to run bitcoin-util-test.py manually

comments.diff_hunk:
@@ -6,8 +6,25 @@
 import os
 import bctest
 import buildenv
+import sys

@@ -6,8 +6,25 @@
 import os
 import bctest
 import buildenv
+import sys
comments.body: Ooops. Nothing now. I was originally using `sys.argv`, but then changed to use `argparse`. I'll remove it and squash the commits.
